Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hey... Could you at least take the
clothes off, first?
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>A new stable means there's a big
opportunity for market expansion.
New customers, here I come!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd love to check out Rito Village, but do
you know how cold it gets up there?
Yeah, no, thanks.
Snowfield Stable is about all the cold
I can handle. And that's WITH all the
food and stuff that warms you up.
Hey... If you're tromping around in the
snow, make sure you stock up on the
goods to keep warm.
Com_Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Looks like you don't have the <clr:0000>rupees<clr:ffff>.
So...yeah.<sp:5:1:0>
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Notice>Hey, good timing!<sp:5:0:0> I could use some
help here!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Hey... Wouldn't it be easy for a monster
to spot us around here?

But business is business.<sp:5:0:0> Let's just keep
it quick, yeah?
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Your <clr:0000>pouch <clr:ffff>is full...<sp:5:1:0> Make some space and
we can get back to business.
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, are you looking out for me AND my
goods? <sp:5:0:0>Whoa!<sp:5:0:0> I owe you!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, hey, HEY!<sp:5:0:0> What's that?! I've never
seen a monster like that!
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now that the blizzard's over, I can sell my
products to all the nice folks here.

...It's still frigid though.<sp:5:1:0> Make sure you're
prepared for the cold weather!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>This area's pretty exposed. Where am I
supposed to hide from monsters trying
to steal my goods? 
I don't want to lose my stuff,<sp:5:0:0> but I don't
want to lose a customer either.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>This is the quickest path to <clr:0000>New Serenne
Stable<clr:ffff>. You just gotta be OK with
monsters everywhere.
And, honestly, I'm not OK with that at all.
But what if I meet a customer? Then it'll
be worth it, yeah?
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Brrr. It only gets colder up ahead, so I'm
going to warm up inside <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>.

Want to take a look at my goods first?
You'd better be prepared for that cold.
Safety first.
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Up until recently, this whole area was
being pelted by snow.

Now the blizzard's over, and I can sell my
products to all the nice folks here.

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_00>It's not...not chilly though.<sp:5:1:0> You'll still
want to prepare for cold temperatures.
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I've got rupees if you have something
to sell.
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, hey... I'm here if you've got anything
to sell.
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I need some new stock, so...yeah.
Have anything to sell me?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>I'll be OK in the rain. I've got this hat to
keep me dry!

But what about you? <sp:5:1:0>Maybe you should
look into getting a new hat.

Anyway, I digress. Let's try to wrap this
up before you get soaked through.
ShopGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>It's fate!<sp:5:1:0> No doubt about it...<sp:5:0:0> You're going
to buy something!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>When I hear about a new stable, well,
hey, I have to check it out! <sp:5:0:0>It's what a
merchant's gotta do.
New stables mean new customers. Yeah.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Yeah, I owe you for taking care of me and
my goods. <sp:5:0:0>Here's a little something for
your help.
Greeting_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello, fellow wanderer!<sp:5:1:0> It's difficult
getting around in these parts, isn't it?
BackRange_03_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Hebra blizzard may be over, but the
area around Rito Village is still blanketed
in snow.
So be careful, OK? <sp:5:1:0>You don't want your
legs sinking into the stuff.
SavedLv2_00: <sp:3:0:2:0800>And, hey, even my goods are OK! Thanks!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for the save! <sp:5:1:0>Yeah, fighting's not
really my thing...
Com_Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Where did I put the... Oh, here. How many
do you want?
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>If you're heading that way, it'll just
get colder.<sp:0:4:0>You should figure out a way to stay warm
if you're going to make it to the stable.
Com_Talk_02d: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, this is some good stuff! Thanks!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Hey, you should take the cold seriously.
Make sure you've got ingredients for food
that'll keep you warm.
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Since you stopped by in this weather,
I'll put out a few extras.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I bet there aren't a lot of customers
that head down into that canyon between
Hebra and the eastern plains.<sp:5:0:0>
So, glad to stick to my usual route!
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Yeah, I'm all sold out today.<sp:5:0:0> Thanks for
the business.
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Nothing left today. But, hey, want to
preview my new stock?
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>This is a shortcut to <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>,
but there are monsters everywhere.<sp:5:1:0>

I should take it anyway, right?
For business? For...for business...
ShopGreet_01_3:
That's right—<sp:5:0:0>from Hateno Village in
the east to your pantry! <sp:5:0:0>We're selling
<clr:0000>Hateno Cheese<clr:ffff>!
How about it?<sp:5:0:0> Want to look at our
product lineup?
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was thinking of exploring the deep,
long canyon that separates Hebra region
from the plains to the east.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But what if I went in and couldn't make
my way back out?<sp:5:0:0> It'd be a hard trip even
if I wasn't weighed down with goods.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So, I'm good being right here with you,
my customer!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Hey, you're soaked! Must be freezing.
Just looking at you is giving me shivers.

Let's try to wrap this up before your
paying hand goes numb, yeah?
BackRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Although the blizzard's lifted, it'd be risky
for me to travel all the way to Rito Village.

What if my wagon wheels got stuck in
the snow? I don't even want to think
about it...
And they say your legs can sink into the
stuff just as easily. <sp:5:1:0>So be careful, OK?
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>I've been building up my stock.
Take a look.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, I thought I was a goner for sure.
Thanks for jumping in!
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0701>How many would you like to sell?
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, thanks!<sp:5:0:0> Now that my goods and I are
safe, I can get back to business!
